tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE voice_assistant_commands (
    command_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    command_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    command_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE voice_commands (
    command_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    command_name VARCHAR(100),
    device_id INT,
    command_description VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_device_id FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES smart_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name STRING,
    device_type STRING,
    room_id INT,
    status STRING
);

CREATE TABLE voice_commands (
    command_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    command_string STRING,
    related_device_id INT,
    executed_by_user STRING,
    execution_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (
  device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  room_id INT NOT NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);
